name: GL.iNet Flint 2 (GL-MT6000)
description: Enthusiast WiFi 6 router with open-source OpenWrt support. Features 2.5G WAN/LAN ports, WireGuard VPN, and AdGuard Home. The tinkerer's dream router.

reviews.review_text: OpenWrt with great hardware. Perfect combo.
Built-in VPN and AdGuard is brilliant.
